intro: Barleria longissima, commonly known as the longleaf barleria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm. The plant features slender, branching stems covered in fine, hairy foliage. Its showy, tubular flowers are usually pink or purple, appearing in clusters at the ends of the branches. Barleria longissima thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a popular choice for gardens and landscapes.
